ValidationRule.description: Validate user must enter either mobile or office for prospect / qualified prospect
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(CONTAINS( RecordType.Name, 'Retail')), ISBLANK(Phone), ISBLANK( Mobile_Number_PE__c ), RecordType.Name <> "Existing Customer", RecordType.Name <> "Inactive Customer")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mobile or Office Phone Number must be entered
